actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the furnishing of outpatient rehabilitation services.

summary.text: Includes inpatient and outpatient rehabilitation services among the items covered under the Medicare program of the Social Security Act. Includes a rehabilitation facility as a provider of services for purposes of the Medicare program. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for the furnishing of outpatient rehabilitation services.
